DefenceText: In Ordulu Information Technologies, a company that develops unique solutions for Unmanned Aerial Vehicles in the field of Defense Industry, you can join the ranks of expert, competent and dynamic engineers in their fields.
CareerSentence1: We offer you the opportunity for a successful career journey.
CareerSentence2: Take advantage of the opportunities we have put into practice to develop the managerial skills of our talented employees and enable them to stand out with their talents.
SendMessage2: You can send us your suggestions, comments and complaints.

Question1: What would you like to say about the project you are working on?
Answer1:
There are multiple projects in our company that are valuable and morally strong. I am the Desktop/iOS team leader of the end-to-end encrypted secure instant messaging application called Ulak.Im. 

Currently, over 100 thousand users are in our project. , dear customers, I have teammates who work hard.

Ulak.ım, which is a completely secure communication application, has facilities such as conference calling, audio and video conversation, sending files and media, instant messaging.
Question2: What are your goals in Ordulu?
Answer2:
We are doing a job with a high national and moral feeling. We are making more valuable developments for our industry and our country every day. 

Our goal is to grow day by day, to represent our country in the best way in the national and international arena and to make a difference. is to create.

KuzgunMainText: Kuzgun is a system that provides instantaneous transmission of live broadcasts from air and land vehicles from the secure network to the mobile internet network in an end-to-end encrypted manner.
SahinMainText: ŞAHİN performs real-time data processing and analysis over images by integrating with imaging systems in UAVs and armored vehicles.
ArzMainText: ARZ is a new generation 3D virtual globe application of Geographic Information System. ARZ Geographic Information System provides solutions to GIS needs in the field of defense technologies with its flexible structure and easy-to-manage interface.
GamMainText: The management of this process can be carried out quickly thanks to its user-friendly interface, by giving user-based permission by authorized personnel before the operation activities of air and land vehicles.
UlakMainText: ULAK.IM is an instant messaging application developed with domestic and national resources. In our age where information privacy and security are at the forefront, ULAK.IM, developed as an alternative to foreign applications, provides communication security and confidentiality by preventing information from leaving the country.
